question: What chemicals are in TMT bars?

retrieved_documents.title: TMT bar chemical composition
retrieved_documents.text: TMT bars chemical composition as per IS 1786:2008: Carbon (C): maximum 0.25%, Manganese (Mn): present for strength, Sulfur (S): maximum 0.055%, Phosphorus (P): maximum 0.055%. Actual composition varies by grade and manufacturer specifications.

User question: What chemicals are in TMT bars?

Answer:
answer: TMT bars contain Carbon (C): maximum 0.25%, Manganese (Mn), Sulfur (S): maximum 0.055%, and Phosphorus (P): maximum 0.055% as per IS 1786:2008 (technical_specs_2024.pdf, 2024-11-01).
